Process

At its core, our relationship is split into 6 phases. Each phase has a clear goal and is designed to make progress towards answering big questions and validating big ideas. Each phase is flexible and there is lots of room to experiment with different techniques.

Phase 1

Discovery

Overview of Discovery

In the discovery stage, we work closely with you to understand your business goals, processes, and pain points. We'll identify the specific challenges that you're facing and determine how we can help you overcome them through the use of our software solutions.

Learn More

Resources

How to Plan For Success Modernizing an Established Business Common Misunderstandings around Software Development Calculating the ROI for Software Adoption

Phase 2

Development

Overview of Development

In the development stage, we'll begin building your customized software solution based on your specific needs and requirements. This involves creating a detailed project plan, designing the solution, and developing the software.

Learn More

Resources

What is Data? Complexity is the Enemy of Success Our Approach to Design Teams of One

Phase 3

Testing

Overview of Testing

Once the software solution is built, we'll move into the testing stage. We will thoroughly test the solution to ensure that it meets your requirements and works as expected. We'll also make any necessary tweaks or adjustments based on your feedback.

Learn More

Resources

Testing 101

Phase 4

Launch

Overview of Launch

Once testing is complete and you're satisfied with the solution, we'll launch it for your business. We'll provide training and support to ensure that your team is able to use the solution effectively and efficiently.

Learn More

Resources

Creating a Public Launch Strategy Creating an Internal Launch Strategy

Phase 5

Maintenance

Overview of Maintenance

After launch, we'll continue to provide ongoing maintenance and support to ensure that the solution continues to meet your needs and stays up-to-date with any changes to your business processes or requirements.

Learn More

Resources

Maintaining Your Software An Introduction to Documentation and Support Optimizing Your Software

Who you'll work with

Meet Yosef Serkez, a seasoned software engineer and consultant with a passion for helping local businesses. With over five years of experience in software development, integrations and adoptions, Yosef has advised a diverse range of companies, from small businesses to enterprise giants like L'Occitane and Salesforce. Yosef is committed to simplifying complex software solutions for his clients, reducing unnecessary complexity and streamlining processes. He takes pride in his ability to understand his clients' needs and provide customized solutions that help them achieve their goals efficiently. Beyond his work in the software industry, Yosef enjoys hiking in his free time. He recently completed the Pacific Crest Trail, a 2,650-mile trek that spans from Mexico to Canada. This passion for the outdoors reflects his desire for simplicity and reducing complexity in all aspects of his life.

FAQ

If you have a question that isn't answered here, please feel free to contact us.

What services do you offer?

We offer custom software development, IT consulting, cloud-based solutions, and marketing site design and development services to small and mid-sized businesses.

What industries do you service?

We take pride in our capability to create tailored software solutions for a diverse range of businesses, no matter the industry they operate in. Our proficiency in software development and our capacity to comprehend our clients' specific needs and objectives enables us to deliver top-notch solutions that boost efficiency, productivity, and growth for their businesses regardless of their industry.

How long does a typical project take?

The timeline for a project depends on its complexity and scope, but our fixed cost, fixed time model ensures that you'll have a clear timeline for completion upfront. We aim for projects to take between 1 and 6 months.

How do you ensure the quality of your work?

We have a rigorous quality assurance process in place that involves testing and debugging throughout the development cycle to ensure that our solutions meet your specific needs and requirements.

How do you handle project communication and updates?

We provide regular project updates and communicate with clients via email, phone, or video conferencing depending on their preferences.

Do you offer ongoing maintenance and support after project completion?

Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance and support to ensure that your software solutions continue to meet your business needs. Support for the first month after project completion is included in the initial project scope and cost. Support and maintenance thereafter is subject to an additional agreement which we will discuss during our initial conversations, prior to development.

How do you ensure the security of my data and information?

We use industry-standard security protocols and technologies to protect your data and information.

How can I get started with Outline Solutions?

You can get started by contacting us through our website or by phone to schedule a consultation. We'll work with you to understand your specific needs and requirements and provide a customized solution that meets your business goals.

Contact

Get in touch with us to discuss your project and how we can help you achieve your goals.
